item.title: State of the Map Africa is taking palce this week in Yaounde, Cameroon. Read more: https://2023.stateofthemap.africa/ #OpenStreetMap #OSM #SOTMAfrica

The manifestos from the #OSMF Board candidates (& their answers to the Q&A) has been published as usual, on the OSM wiki <https://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Foundation/AGM2023/Election_to_Board/Answers_and_manifestos> #OpenStreetMap #OSM
go out and map 😁😁😁
State of the Map Asia is happening in Bangkok in a few days @sotmasia #SotMAsia2023 #sotmasia <https://stateofthemap.asia/>

how it started : how it ended State of the Map Europe 2023 edition @sotmeu #OpenStreetMap #OSM #sotmeu Collage of two photos. Upper half is a jigsaw not done with slogan "how it started" Bottom half is the jigsaw done (it's a map) with caption "how it ended" In the the middle is the icon for state of the Map Europe 2023 icon
The follow what's happening at State of the Map Europe this weekend, you can follow the official account @sotmeu or the hashtag #sotmeu! 😄😄😄 #OpenStreetMap #OSM
What are you mapping now? #OpenStreetMap #OSM #WeLoveMaps #Maps

Microsoft Pledges $150k to support OpenStreetMap! read more: <https://blog.openstreetmap.org/2023/10/25/microsoft-pledges-150k-to-support-openstreetmap/> #OpenStreetMap #OSM #gischat #maps #map #geo #microsoft

The OpenStreetMap Foundation is a global organisation for the main OpenStreetMap IP, but the OSMF can't do everything. Local Chapters are an important part of the OpenStreetMap project. Read more about how to become an OSMF Local Chapter: https://blog.openstreetmap.org/2023/10/12/local-chapters-what-to-know-and-how-to-join/ #OpenStreetMap #OSM

And they're off! 🏇! The #OpenStreetMap Foundation Board election in Dec. has 3 open seats, and 6 candidates. List of candidates: <https://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Foundation/AGM2023/Election_to_Board#List_of_board_candidates>

Only a few hours left to nominate yourself for election to the #OpenStreetMap Foundation Board! There's currently 4 candidates for 3 seats. Have a look at who's running, at what the board does, at what you do, and what #OSM needs, and what you can bring, and NOMINATE YOURSELF! 😁 https://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Foundation/AGM2023/Election_to_Board

If you don't/can't run for the #OpenStreetMap Foundation board, why not reach out to your favourite OSMers and ask them to consider standing for election?😍 more info: <https://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Foundation/AGM2023/Election_to_Board> #OSM

Do you want to be on the #OpenStreetMap Foundation Board? There are 3 seats open, and you have until 21st Oct to nominate yourself! more info: <https://lists.openstreetmap.org/pipermail/osmf-talk/2023-October/008759.html> nominate yourself here: <https://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Foundation/AGM2023/Election_to_Board#Submission_of_self-nominations> #OSM #OSMF #gischat

3 days left! 📢 Call for Maps: State of the Map Europe 2023 🗺 What's it going to be? Map of your country or city? Bike trails? Mini libraries? Wind turbines? Submit your #OSM-based map by Oct. 18th to be displayed in Antwerp on Nov. 10-12! 😎 🌐 https://stateofthemap.eu/call-for-maps #OpenStreetMap #gischat #maps #map #SotMEU2023 #SotM #SotMEU

🌍 Preparing for #SotMAfrica2023 in Cameroon? If you require a visa for Cameroon🇨🇲, easily apply for an e-visa here: https://evisacam.cm/ords/dl_portal/r/public_portal/home ✈️ Safe travels! see more: <https://twitter.com/sotmafrica/status/1709848703484203063>

Do you like maps? Why am I asking, of course you do! Have you made your own map? Yay! Would you like to show it off at @sotmeu, the annual european #OpenStreetMap conference? You're in luck! Read more here: <https://stateofthemap.eu/call-for-maps> #OpenStreetMap #OSM #SotM #SotMEU #maps #gischat

In the #OpenStreetMap data model, linear features are (mostly) represented by the `way` data type, which can have at most 2,000 `node`s. Can you find a way for OpenStreetMap to have more than 2,000 donations by going https://supporting.openstreetmap.org/donate/ 🥺🥺 #OSM
The #OpenStreetMap Donation drive is almost at 2,000 donations! 😍 Can you find a way to make it over 2,000?🥺🥺 https://supporting.openstreetmap.org/donate/
What #OpenStreetMap map style do you like? 🗺🤔 reply with nice examples of #OSM maps! 😊

There's a new map style on OpenStreetMap.org! The Tracestrack Topo map from @tracestrack. It's a mix of osm-carto and OpenTopoMap. It has many improvements: more tag support (busway, embankment, cuisine, solar plants, aquaculture, pitch, sea, tree etc.), CJK fonts, etc. There is also better internationalisation: country specific road shields, peaks using imperial system in the US, hierarchical place rendering in China, etc. #OpenStreetMap #OSM #gischat #maps A screenshot of OSM.org showing the map layer sector open and showing tracesstrack Topo map selected and that as a map shown
